body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our company. My name is Sarah Anderson and I am here to assist you. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah! My name is John Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, John! Could you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, three three three, two two two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you, John. And may I also have your email address, spelled out letter by letter?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's J-O-H-N dot S-M-I-T-H at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have noted your contact information. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I appreciate your help, Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for reaching out. Have a great day!
